verses.roman:
ta evaṁ loka-nāthena
paripṛṣṭāḥ su-sat-kṛtāḥ
pratyūcur hṛṣṭa-manasas
tat-pādekṣā-hatāṁhasaḥ

synonyms: te—they (Yudhiṣṭhira and Lord Kṛṣṇa's other relatives); evam—thus; loka—of the universe; nāthena—by the Lord; paripṛṣṭāḥ—questioned; su—very much; sat-kṛtāḥ—honored; pratyūcuḥ—replied; hṛṣṭa—joyful; manasaḥ—whose minds; tat—His; pāda—the feet; īkṣā—by seeing; hata—destroyed; aṁhasaḥ—whose sins.
translation: Feeling greatly honored, King Yudhiṣṭhira and the others, freed of all sinful reactions by seeing the feet of the Lord of the universe, gladly answered His inquiries.
